hero.title: Flutter & Web Developer
hero.description: Software Engineer specialized in Flutter and React ecosystems, with experience across mobile, web, and component-based architectures. Passionate about clean architecture, reusable design systems, and modern frontend development.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who I Am
about.paragraph1: Hey there! I'm Ahmed Tamer, a Software Engineer with a passion for building high-quality, scalable, and user-friendly applications. My focus lies in Flutter and React development, covering both mobile and web platforms.
about.paragraph2: I’ve worked on multiple in-house and client projects under Applogica, including ERP systems, invoice management, and AI-powered chat applications integrated with LiveKit and Paymob. I value clean architecture, component reusability, and maintainable codebases.
about.paragraph3: Currently, I’m also expanding my skills into backend development using Spring Boot, learning about RESTful APIs, microservices, and database design to become a full-stack developer.

items.title: Mobile App Development
items.description: Building high-performance Android and iOS apps using Flutter with clean architecture, responsive UI, and smooth animations.

items.title: Web Application Development
items.description: Developing modern, responsive, and modular web apps using React, Vite, and Next.js with reusable components and design systems.

items.title: API Integration
items.description: Connecting apps to RESTful APIs using Dio and Axios with efficient state management and error handling.

items.title: Firebase & Paymob Integration
items.description: Implementing authentication, analytics, and payment features using Firebase and Paymob API.

items.title: Design Systems & Clean Architecture
items.description: Creating modular architectures and UI component libraries to maintain code scalability and consistency across projects.

items.title: ERP System (React)
items.description: Built and maintained a modular ERP system using React and TypeScript. Implemented a design system using Atomic Design and Storybook, published as an NPM package for UI consistency.

items.title: E-Invoice SaaS System (React + Vite)
items.description: Developed a SaaS invoice management system integrated with the Egyptian Tax Authority. Improved UI/UX, performance, and added multi-company features.

items.title: AI Invoice Assistant (Next.js + LiveKit)
items.description: Developed an AI-powered assistant that processes invoices and interacts with users in real time using WebRTC and LiveKit.

items.title: POS App (Vite)
items.description: Developed a web-based POS system for seamless product and transaction management, integrating with the backend APIs for real-time operations.

items.title: Flous App (Flutter)
items.description: A money transfer app built on Paymob API for transactions, verification, and user onboarding. Used Cubit for state management and Firebase for analytics.

items.title: Ticketing App (React)
items.description: Developed a smart ticketing system allowing users to create, manage, and track support tickets. Built with React and REST APIs.

items.title: Applogica Company Website (Next.js)
items.description: Developed the company’s official website using Next.js, focusing on SEO, responsive design, and content modularity.

items.title: Ahjazili Booking Platform (Flutter)
items.description: Developed a booking platform connecting merchants and customers for hotels and wedding halls in Libya using Flutter, Firebase, and Dio.

items.title: Worker’s App (Flutter)
items.description: A job platform connecting businesses and workers with chat, file sharing, and notifications. Built with Flutter, Firebase, and Hive.

items.title: Arshdny Platform (Graduation Project)
items.description: A social platform supporting refugees with job search, education, and communication. Built with Flutter, .NET, Python, and Firebase.

Worked on multiple projects including ERP, E-Invoice SaaS, POS, Ticketing, and Flous App. Built reusable design systems and contributed to AI-integrated web applications using LiveKit. Managed code quality via SonarQube and deployed solutions on Azure.
